head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths JENKINS, JULIA HODGES

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths JENKINS, JULIA HODGES

block.p: JENKINS-Julia Hodges. We are deeply saddened by the death of our beloved member. A winner in 1999 of our Distinguished Service Award, Judy was a mainstay of our club and a leading figure in the design world for decades. We will miss her terribly. Our deepest sympathies to her daughter, Hutsien Brown, and her family. The Decorators Club
